archimate:BusinessInteraction.name: Hyperledger
archimate:BusinessInteraction.documentation: An initiative of the Linux Foundation to develop open source distributed ledger and blockchain technology. The Hyperledger home page is https://wiki.hyperledger.org/. See Hyperledger Indy.
